body_html: Yes, you'll have to limit the number of steps using a StepCounterHook or make sure your input function throws an appropriate exception after the training data is depleted (either StopIteration or OutOfRangeError).
body_text: Yes, you'll have to limit the number of steps using a StepCounterHook or make sure your input function throws an appropriate exception after the training data is depleted (either StopIteration or OutOfRangeError).
body: Yes, you'll have to limit the number of steps using a [`StepCounterHook`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/train/StopAtStepHook) or make sure your input function throws an appropriate exception after the training data is depleted (either `StopIteration` or `OutOfRangeError`).
